ComicInfo.Summary:
With the realms in turmoil, Skye is left at the mercy of everything the universe is throwing at her. Surviving the maze from last issue only leaves her more unprepared for what is to come. Will her first trip to the mythical Atlantis be her last?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Martin Coccolo & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | John Royle, Jagdish Kumar & Mohan Sivakami | 3 | D | Cover D | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 4 | E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Blank Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | None | Missing | F | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Michael Dooney (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Gemini Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | Zenescope Anniversary Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | I | Zenescope Anniversary Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | J | Secret Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to ? | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing |
